availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Jackson Fleming (Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Catherine Fleming. Father of Peter Fleming, Catherine Fleming, and Charlotte Fleming. Married to Nancy S. Burgess Fleming in Livingston County, Kentucky, on September 22, 1853. Father of James Fleming and Frederick Fleming. Farmer in Livingston County in 1850. Farmer in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Livingston, p. 361B.
